extendedInfo.description: "Remember to wipe off the drool before disembarking - WIRED"Ever wanted to get some sleep during a train or bus ride without worrying about missing your stop? iNap wakes you up right before you'll reach your destination! Travel, sleep and arrive fresh.- Drop the pin on the map or select your destination by search.- Efficient GPS usage, saving your battery life as much as possible.- Select your favorite wake up ringtone / alarm sound.- Our owl takes care of you, sit back and get your nappin' on!

reviews.title: Top application!
reviews.comment: I have read some reviews for this app and decided to counter some of them. I\'ve had the app 3 months and never had a problem, it always goes off and wakes me up. It is now essential to me! If it was paid, I would pay for. I don\'t write many reviews, but I thought some of the comments unfair given my own experience. Try and you\'ll see for yourself!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was great until update
reviews.comment: Latest update has made this a real pain as wipes destonation every time you close the app and has loSt ability to hold preselected favourite destinations. Will uninstall if no fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Remember to switch on
reviews.comment: Works for me but after typing in destination you then have to go to the bottom of the screen to tick \"Alarm On\". I forget about that bit. A lot. Then miss my stop. Let\'s have an update which automatically turns the alarm on
reviews.author: David Harrison

reviews.comment: Like the idea but needs bug fixing. Keeps vibrating after alarm goes off have to restart phone to stop it even force close won\'t stop it! HTC DesireHD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good concept but it never really worked. Every time i tried to start it after the first couple of times, it would force quit every time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Need to fix the continual vibrate on the droid, and remove popup in favour of the notification bar, then I\'d score higher.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool idea but gps doesn\'t turn off and picking destinations by address only is restrictive. Fantastic idea that needs slightly better execution.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Two stars for the idea. Program is really unstable on Android 2.1, on Motorola Milestone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Force closes everytime I try to add a destination. Cool idea. Hope to try it again when the kinks have been worked out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app! Dependable. Only thing i found wrong is if you enable vibrate with your alert the vibrate wont stop unless you force quit the app! Moto dr
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Recommended by gadget show....although don\'t know why, doesn\'t work on my HTC hero. Fc continually...don\'t download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Used to love it, doesnt seem to have been updated in years. As OS is updated FCs more and more. Looking for alternatives now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I dont know how this app won on adc2, its useless! One should be able to tap on the screen to select the location and after a few trys it starts to FC
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Use it mostly to get constant gps fix even after closing the task. Nice \'feature\'
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very basic and buggy: kept vibrating after I\'d dismissed the alarm! Had to force kill the app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great idea! However, since GPS on the galaxy phones STILL doesn\'t work, this app is useless to me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app!! Needs slight ui tweaking...all in all great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice idea but has unintuitive interface and vibration doesn\'t stop until app is killed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fantastic idea,  but it sucks that you have to  reboot the phone to shut the GPS off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not work and alarm started going off at 3am in the morning when 4 miles from location.... and in bed! Galaxy S
reviews.author: A Google User
